title: hokecos
author: hokecos
content: Mars Wars is an online game, 2D shooter. There are two parties in the game: the beasts and the aliens. These two parties are at war with each other. Each one has 25 unique characters, and each has different abilities.The basic game mode:The basic game mode is "50/50," with 50 beasts fighting against 50 aliens. If someone kills the player, he returns to the game after 5-7 seconds at the base and with standard weapons.The kills credit you Zimbabwean dollars, which can buy better weapons.Airdrops drop every 5 minutes. There may be such things: alien bomb, regeneration nanorobots, ray weapons, speed boots, firstaid kit, energizer, sandstorm, etc.There are five kinds of stuff in the airdrop. One player can take only one thing, which they choose themselves. But you have to make a quick choice; otherwise, allies will run up and take everything. Also, this airdrop always drops in the map center, and 50 enemies don't want to share it with you.The game runs for 45 minutes, and at the end, four players get a briefcase. The case may contain a weapon skin, clothing for a character, or a temporary game bonus, all of which you can sell to others.Character levels and characteristics:There are a total of 100 levels in the game. For each gained level, the character's characteristics increase. To gain experience and move to the next level, you must do damage to enemies.Characteristics of the character:- Health- Energy- Regeneration- Reload speed- Shot accuracyRead more info: https://mars-wars.com/whitepaper.pdfBuy kits: https://mars-wars.com/buy-kits.htmlConnect with us:Telegram: https://t.me/Mars_WarsTwitter: https://twitter.com/MarsWarsGoFacebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/711963863159760/
